VelaTwins.Model package

Submodules

VelaTwins.Model.model module

class VelaTwins.Model.model.Model(data, model=None)

Bases: object

This is the model module for using the pre-trained model. This model takes data from the config_data module and uses SBERT to embed the entire company universe into 768 dimensional space. This model can also be configured to use a custom embedder.

Inputs: data from config_date, optionally: custom embedding model Outputs: embedded universe, a 768xn matrix, where n is the length of the dataset.

Example use: Stock model: embed_univ = Model(data).run()

Custom model: embed_univ = Model(data, model = [NAME OF CUSTOM MODEL]).run()

run()
